contentList.content: Torn and hell-scented, these trousers have seen a good deal of action - though not perhaps the sort Karlach might prefer.
Torn and blood-scented, these trousers have seen a good deal of action.
A rough combination of rugs, leathers, metal and supple fabrics.
A heavy, crude chest once stolen from the Chaos Forge, likely traded through the shadowy Black Network. The real mystery is how it found its way here.

A chest brimming with dresses in all styles and colors - once part of someone's prized collection. Whether for ballroom twirls or cozy tavern nights, these outfits have stories stitched into every seam
This chest holds an impressive assortment of gloves, each pair worn but well-kept. It's like someone was preparing for every kind of encounter - gentle or grim.
A portable container woven from dried reeds.
Wicker Chest from Molten Mug Inn
Chest from the Molten Mug Inn. It’s packed with various supplies - mostly wine and beer. Looks like it was meant for a party in a forge.
An oddly specific collection - this chest holds nothing but underwear. Someone had... particular priorities.
A strange collection of boots, all shaped for paws and clawed feet. Whoever wore these had more joints than human,

A chest packed with a mix of freshly forged armor and well-worn pieces - some gleam with the heat of the forge, while others show the scars of battles fought long ago. Together, they tell a story of new beginnings and hard-earned experience.
The chest hums faintly with arcane energy. Inside, armor pieces shimmer with enchantments - runes etched into metal, fabric that resists flame, and plates that feel far too light for their size.
A clang of steel as the lid opens - helmets stacked inside, from ornate visors to plain iron domes. Some are clearly new; others still smell faintly of blood and smoke.

A chest full of enchanted boots, each pair humming with latent magic. Useful, powerful, stylish and just magical enough to make Gale eye them like a midnight snack. Best keep the lid closed when he’s around.
A chest lined with enchanted capes - some shimmer like starlight, others vanish the moment you blink. Each one seems to carry a breeze, even when the air is still.
Inside magical gloves of every sort - some spark at the fingertips, others flex like they’re waiting to cast a spell on their own. One pair waved. Probably.
A chest of magical helmets, each humming with silent spells. A few look back when you stare too long. One may or may not be thinking.
A chest packed with bloodstained armor and torn garments - taken from those who crossed paths with Bhaal’s faithful. The scent of old death clings to the fabric.

A chest packed with a mix of freshly forged armor and well-worn pieces - some gleam with the heat of the forge, while others show the scars of battles fought long ago. Together, they tell a story of new beginnings and hard-earned experience.

A chest packed with a mix of freshly forged armor and well-worn pieces - some gleam with the heat of the forge, while others show the scars of battles fought long ago. Together, they tell a story of new beginnings and hard-earned experience.

This chest holds an impressive assortment of gloves, each pair worn but well-kept. It's like someone was preparing for every kind of encounter - gentle or grim.
A well-worn chest of timber and iron, packed with capes of all kinds.
Slippers and Paw wraps in all styles and colors - made to fit most common paws across Faerûn.

A chest brimming with dresses and slippers in all styles and colors - once part of someone's prized collection. Whether for ballroom twirls or cozy tavern nights, these outfits have stories stitched into every seam

A chest brimming with dresses and slippers in all styles and colors - once part of someone's prized collection. Whether for ballroom twirls or cozy tavern nights, these outfits have stories stitched into every seam

A chest brimming with dresses and slippers in all styles and colors - once part of someone's prized collection. Whether for ballroom twirls or cozy tavern nights, these outfits have stories stitched into every seam

A chest brimming with dresses and slippers in all styles and colors - once part of someone's prized collection. Whether for ballroom twirls or cozy tavern nights, these outfits have stories stitched into every seam
An oddly specific collection - this chest holds nothing but underwear. Someone had... particular priorities.
The metal, gems, and wood are all polished to perfection, as though the chest's fabricator had all the time in the world to make it.

A chest packed with a mix of freshly forged armor and well-worn pieces - some gleam with the heat of the forge, while others show the scars of battles fought long ago. Together, they tell a story of new beginnings and hard-earned experience.

A chest packed with a mix of freshly forged armor and well-worn pieces - some gleam with the heat of the forge, while others show the scars of battles fought long ago. Together, they tell a story of new beginnings and hard-earned experience.
Scorched, stained, and dented, this suit of githyanki armour has survived the unthinkable - and still endured.
Shaped, hardened, leather is the armour of choice for those who value agility as much as protection.
Lavishly decorated boots, crafted on far-away planes from stolen metals and poached rubies.
Lavishly decorated boots, crafted on far-away planes from stolen metals and poached rubies.
These boots are stamped with the marks of a cancelled commission. Despite their discarded fate, they still hum with complex infernal arcana.

When worn, a subtle pressure coils around the calves - like the brush of tentacles or a thought not entirely your own. Some claim that wearing them too long causes dreams not your own… and hungers that are hard to silence.
Wrapped in sun-hardened leather and bone-plated cuffs, these boots thunder across stone and snow alike, worn by those whose rage echoes louder than warhorns.

Boots lined with beast-fur and battle grime, built to trample snow, stone, and skull alike. Favored by highland raiders, these rugged boots keep the cold out and the blood in. The fur isn’t just for warmth-it’s a trophy, ripped from a slain winter wolf, still carrying the beast’s savage pride.
Boots from undead elf. They lost all of their former power
This armour was forged to Vlaakith's standards under the exacting eye of a githyanki smith.

Nothing stings the master blacksmith more than a cancelled commission - not even molten iron. This mail is engraved with the mark of a devillish forgemaster, as well as several curses stamped out in Infernal, and hums with diabolic magic.
These gauntlets spark with unfinished, yet still potent devillish magic - indicative of a cancelled blacksmith's commission.
This armour was forged to Vlaakith's standards under the exacting eye of a githyanki smith, broken, though
This armour was forged to Vlaakith's standards under the exacting eye of a githyanki smith.

Looks different on some races .Nothing stings the master blacksmith more than a cancelled commission - not even molten iron. This mail is engraved with the mark of a devillish forgemaster, as well as several curses stamped out in Infernal, and hums with diabolic magic.

Studded Leather Armour with scarf belt +1
This armour is strong enough to stop a dagger and light enough to escape whatever weapon follows it.
Shaped, hardened, and reinforced with metal studs, leather is the armour of choice for those who value agility as much as protection.
This armour is strong enough to stop a dagger and light enough to escape whatever weapon follows it.
Githyanki actually do have a comedy culture, and it's this: they attack anyone who makes them the butt of a joke.

While the stitching on the shirt is rushed and uneven, the chain mail is sturdy, and the garment is decorated with an obsidian disk that seems to swallow all light.

Light, framing the face like a window to the wearer's expression of devotion A crude helm fashioned from a hyena’s skull, bound with strips of leather and adorned with scavenged feathers. Once worn to intimidate prey and rivals alike, it still carries the musk of the wild and the faint rattle of old bones.
Light, framing the face like a window to the wearer's expression of devotion for the Absolute.
Light, framing the face like a window to the wearer's expression of devotion for the Absolute.

Taken from the body of a fallen gnoll, this armor still bears the stench of its former owner. The leather is cracked, the metal dented, yet it remains serviceable - if you don’t mind carrying the scent of the wild with you.
Debug Chest. If you see this, tell the modsmith and toss it into a chasm - it poses a threat to the existence of everything around.
